kdobbs74 i think i figured out a way to buy the dlc's without having the game, but it will be kinda risky on your end. and we will need someone who has the game already so that you could gift him the DLC through steam. i think that we can confirm Themperror as a trustful user.

FIRST of all you will have to go to steam's rocksmith page

SECOND press on see all and choose a DLC you would like to buy and press add to cart.
page 

THIRD select PURCHASE AS A GIFT 
login to your steam account(if you don't have one yet create one) 

select Email my gift 
and then fill out a a user who bought the game i prefer the Themperror 

btw you need Themperror's mail so you could send him the gift. fill 

out the buyout form and let the person you gifted the DLC upload it 

here.

Instead of looking through the forum someone posted all the DLC out so far here.
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7769642/Rocksmith_DLCs

If anyone downloaded the Installed Steam Files version with Themperror's crack, you can get DLC working by switching the crack with TinyISO's 'crack only' file, so you don't need to redownloaded the whole TinyISO torrent. You still need to create the Content folder under SteamApps/Rocksmith/
